title: Drag & Drop Quiz
description: A mix of drag-and-drop and standard questions.

questions.question: Arrange these historical events in chronological order
questions.explanation: Printing press (~1440), French Revolution (1789), Moon landing (1969), WWW (1989).

questions.question: Match each element to its chemical symbol
questions.explanation: Au (aurum), Ag (argentum), Fe (ferrum), Cu (cuprum) are the Latin-derived symbols.

questions.question: Sort these into renewable and non-renewable energy sources
questions.explanation: Solar, wind, and hydroelectric are renewable. Coal, natural gas, and oil are fossil fuels.

questions.question: What is the chemical formula for water?
questions.explanation: Water consists of two hydrogen atoms and one oxygen atom.
